data.title: Yuma #3
data.text:
Watching the sunset from the opposite side, I am sitting in a very comfortable chair outside my room drinking a beer. It's Friday night and I'm watching the cars and bicycles go by, but no one can see me since I am set so far back from the street.
I may end my reviews of Yuma motels here. I really like this place. The room is very nice, the bed is clean and comfortable, and the aesthetics of the place are so retro and nostalgic. The bathroom is small, but the hot water is fast. The owners are very friendly, and judging from the smell of the office, she is a very good cook.
The soda machine doesn't work or was sold out. Whatever, I only wanted a water since the ones I had were sitting in my very hot car for too long.
They even had a smoking room (sorry Mom). I would stay here again in a second.

data.title: Clean and inexpensive!
data.text: Super impressed for the price! Very clean inside and out. Mini fridge, microwave and hair dryer in room. But no coffee maker or clock. Bed not too bad, but the pillows  feel like bricks. However I would stay here again, the great price overrides a pillow ;)

data.title: Personal touches made our day
data.text:
Clean, updated room with tile bathrooms, granite countertops, microwave and mini-refrigerator. We paid a winter premium rate of $59 for 2 full size beds. For only $5 more than Motel 6, with reliable hi-speed wifi that many budget motels don't have, this hotel is a bargain. 
The flat screen tv was not showing all the cable channels so the manager/owner came promptly and reprogrammed our tv. She was very kind to us and our 4 year old that evening and she listened when my child described her love of drawing. At checkout the next morning the owners had brought color pencils specifically for our child. My daughter felt special and needless to say, this was the first time we received such personal service at any motel/hotel regardless of "star level".

data.title: Great stay......
data.text: We stayed 8 days in this motel.Very clean,comfortable beds,spacious rooms.Flat screen T.V mega chanals.Good stay. The owners and housekeepers are very friendly. Fridge and microwave works well.  We enjoyed our stay.

data.title: Nice size rooms with mini fridge and microwave
data.text: This is a very nice family owned and operated business...  pool very inviting and refreshing... beds very comfortable....  quite was a real experience....  Chatted with the owners for a bit. very charming young couple and very responsible...  will stay again...

data.title: Very pleased with what the new owners have done.
data.text: I was displeased with another motel and stopped by this one on recommendations from locals. I met the new owners who showed me the renovations they made. The outside of the motel doesn't look appealing, but the rooms have new furniture, flat screen televisions, microwave, fridge, and even new tile in the bathroom. Everything was clean and cared for. I immediately checked in and then went to check out of the other place I was staying. The WiFi worked well and the cable was clear and had a lot of channels. The water pressure was great, unlike other motels. They do not offer much for breakfast, just coffee and packaged muffins. The entire motel was quiet and drama free. I will stay here every year from now on and next time I will bring my family.

data.title: This Property has Gone Downhill
data.text:
Stayed here a year or so ago and at that time I thought it was a pretty good deal.  Based on that I stayed again when traveling through Yuma.  The price has increased significantly since our last stay.  The room was clean, there had been a number of poorly done upgrades.  The bathroom definitely needed some work.  There is no breakfast, no in-room coffee.  I decided to stay another night and didn't want the hassle of finding a new hotel so asked at the office if I could stay one more night.  I was asked "do you want housekeeping?"  Thinking this may mean a discount in the price I said it was not necessary.  Guess what?  No change in price.  There was supposed to be WIFI but I could never get it to work.

The South 4th area used to have a lot of services.  Since our last visit several business have shut down including a good sized hotel and a couple of smaller ones, some restaurants and a Sears store.  It appears businesses are moving to the Yuma Mall.  Downtown looked like a ghost town as well.  

If we are back in Yuma, we will be looking elsewhere for a room.

data.title: None
data.text: A/C was off in room, frig was off, had to go ask for toliet paper and tissues. No breakfast. The phone didn't work. I would not recommend this motel to any one. Price was ok. What it shows on the internet is not what is there.

data.title: Excellent value and good location
data.text:
I am not sure why this is listed as a BnB or Inn - it is a motel!!

We stayed here on the recommendation of friends who were here last year.

The place is great - the rooms were spacious and comfortable.  Small fridge and microwave in the rooms.  The beds good.  Bathroom had been re-done.  Flat screen TV's.  No continental breakfast or coffee makers in the rooms (coffee in the lobby).

The place was comfortable and quiet and in a good location on 4th.  The best thing was the price - very reasonable.

We will definitely stay here again.

data.title: GREAT VALUE AND LOCATION FOR YOUR DOLLAR
data.text: Clean Rooms with updated bathrooms. Owners were extremely friendly and helpful. We were in town for dental work in Los Algodones. For the price of $50.00 or less per night, this location was excellent for our needs. Not much in the line of "extras" but what was there was most appropriate. We would go back again!

data.title: Great motel
data.text: We came upon this little motel on 4th Ave by chance.  It is so clean and updated, flat screen, microwave, fridge, very nice furniture, the price was very reasonable, I can't imagine paying more to stay any where else.  The owners are very friendly. Coffee available in the office.

data.title: Nice Little Place
data.text: This was a pretty nice place, not so nice as the online photos suggest, but clean and comfy (if just a bit threadbare) and very good rates for the area.  Rooms are large, and the microwave and fridge were amenities that we didn't need, but might be helpful to some travelers. There was coffee and few breakfast items available in the lobby in the morning, and the owners couldn't have been more pleasant.

data.title: A hidden gem for the economical traveler
data.text: The Hacienda is a nice little  motel with a pool centrally located on 4th Ave. The rooms are nothing special, but are spacious and clean. The owners are very helpful and friendly. Rooms have flat screen TV, frig and microwave. There is no breakfast, but several restaurants within walking distance. The price is right and they have a great weekly rate. Free and dependable Wi-fi included. We are returning soon for a week and the week-end was full, but somehow they found a room for us. :)  Don't be fooled by the sign!

data.title: Otrevlig personal och extra kostnader utan att få något tillbaka
data.text:
Otrevligt bemötande vid incheckningen. Ingen service mind över huvudtaget. Krävde 8 $ extra för att vi hade våra barn med som skulle sova i våra sängar men fick inte ens extra handdukar eller någonting extra för dessa 8 $. Pool handdukarna var slut och när vi frågade om det så suckade hon och kastade åt mig 3 st som JAG skulle lämna dit. Jag säger bara.... ALDRIG MER!!!!
Ingen kaffebryggare på rummet, kylskåp och AC avstängt trots en ute temp på 35 gr C.

data.title: Hotel correcte!!!
data.text: Hotel très correcte pour le prix, avec piscine que nous avons utilisé, nous étions seul donc très agréable... Bizarre que l Hotel soit vide pour cette période. Dans l ensemble très correcte hormis le personnel (une femme) très désagréable et pas accueillante du tout...

data.title: Tranquillo, ma nulla di speciale
data.text: Questo motel è molto tranquillo. La zona non è rumorosa, ogni stanza è insonorizzata e vi farete una bella dormita. Non è nulla di che, di conseguenza anche il prezzo è adeguato al livello modesto dell'hotel. Per un notte di passaggio è più che ok. Prezzo di una notte 61$

data.title: günstiges Motel an der 4th Street
data.text:
Motel im Stile der 50-Jahre, einfach aber sauber, Die Rezeptionistin war nicht sonderlich motiviert, aber schließlich doch zufriedenstellende Nächtigung, da Zimmer sauber und im von der doch sehr frequentierten Strasse weg gelegen, Schöner kleiner Pool - haben wir jedoch nicht genutzt.
War mit 39$ unser günstigstes Motel auf unserer Southwest 2013 Rundreise

data.title: Suffisant
data.text: Nous avons passé une seule nuit dans ce motel lors de notre road-trip le prix est très bas ce qui explique la qualité très basse de la chambre et une propretée douteuse, les chambres sont équipées de deux lits 140cm, une TV, un micro-onde et un frigo ceci étant pour une nuit ce motel reste correct et suffisant
